alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 2:01PM MST until January 21 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 4 inches along and east of Interstate 25. 6 to 8 inches of snow expected for Casper Mountain. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
